name: Emi's Synth Shop
description:
Emi's Synth Shop is a 2D JRPG with an emphasis on crafting items.

The game has been in development since late spring 2017, and started as a school project.

Team:

Artist: Snarkfowl (Website , Twitter, Itch.io)

Programmer: TheAffronted(Website, Twitter, Itch.io)

Old Devlog: https://synthshoprpg.tumblr.com/

(When downloaded extract the zip, and keep the folder and the .exe in the same folder (be it desktop, downloads, etc..))
